import './index.scss' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters'; import { useEffect, useState, useRef} from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' import { MapContainer, TileLayer, useMap } from 'react-leaflet' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const refForm = useRef() useEffect(() => { (async () => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) })(); }, []) const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm( 'gmail', 'template_ttfvwak', refForm.current, 'user_LHhzDmzYRfQUkYgoP', ).then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { console.log(refForm.current) alert('Failed to sent the message, please try again!') } ) } return ( <>

I am interested in freelance opportunities - especially on ambitious or large projects. However, if you have any other requests or questions, don't hesitate to contact me using below form either.

Dokyung Yang,
Baltimore MD,
3201 St Paul Street
dkyang1023@gmail.com
) } export default Contact;
